sentences.sContent: He welshed on his agreement with the team that he would play for them in February.
sentences.sCn: 他逃避履行他与球队合同中在二月为他们踢球的协议。

synos.tran: 赖帐，赖赌债逃走；逃避责任

remMethod.val: 和威尔士人(Welsh)的拼写一样

trans.tranCn: 不付赌金而溜掉, 逃避履行义务, 食言
trans.tranOther: If someone welshes on a deal or an agreement, they do not do the things they promised to do as part of that deal or agreement
